title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/qrcode
author: oeyoews
name: qrcode
readme:
! QRCode svg format

<$qrcode />

!! Params

* `renderType`: {url} 当前条目地址
* `text`: string
* `width`: number

!! TODO

* viewtoolbar
* support icon(logo), color https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/issues/240, https://github.com/ushelp/EasyQRCodeJS-NodeJS

!! Credits

* https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode
